info.title: AutoERP API Documentation
info.description: AutoERP is a production-ready, enterprise-level modular SaaS application for vehicle service centers and auto repair garages. Built with Laravel 11 backend and Vue.js 3 frontend, implementing Clean Architecture principles with a strict Controller → Service → Repository pattern. Features comprehensive multi-tenancy support, event-driven architecture, full RBAC, and enterprise-grade security.

post.description: Creates a new user account with the specified details. The user will be associated with a tenant and assigned a role.

tenant_id.description: Tenant ID to associate the user with

role.description: Role to assign (super_admin, admin, manager, user)

post.summary: Authenticate user and receive access token
post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, returns user details and Bearer token for API access
Logs out the authenticated user and revokes their current access token

get.description: Returns the profile information of the currently authenticated user including roles and permissions

post.description: Revokes the current token and issues a new one. Useful for extending session duration
Changes the password for the currently authenticated user. Requires current password verification. User must login again after password change

message.example: Password changed successfully. Please login again.

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the user's email address. For security, always returns success regardless of whether the email exists

email.description: Email address to send reset link to

message.example: If an account exists with this email, you will receive password reset instructions.

post.description: Resets user password using the token received via email from password reset request

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of customers with optional search and filtering. Results are automatically filtered by tenant.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or phone

post.description: Creates a new customer record (individual or business type)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific customer including their vehicles

delete.description: Delete a customer from the system

get.description: Retrieve list of customers who have services scheduled in the near future
Retrieve a paginated list of vehicles with optional filtering by customer, service due date, etc.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by VIN, make, model, or license plate

post.description: Create a new vehicle record and assign it to a customer

get.description: Retrieve detailed vehicle information including current owner and ownership history

post.description: Transfer vehicle to a new customer with complete ownership history tracking
Record new mileage reading for a vehicle

password: The password must be at least 8 characters.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication and authorization endpoints including register, login, logout, password management, and token refresh

tags.name: Customer Management
tags.description: Customer profiles (individual and business), multi-vehicle ownership, service scheduling, and customer analytics

tags.name: Vehicle Management
tags.description: Vehicle CRUD, ownership transfer with history, mileage tracking, and service intervals
